title: [Blood Moon Elise] Maybe is too late but... Elise can be pink again?
body: I dont like her skin in red, and i dont see the pink on the 12/4 update, it just look like a shiny red... Anyway, i prefer SO MUCH this shiny red then her full red (the 2nd color)  BUUUUT  i fall in love with her pink one and yeees i know all of those "but she didn't fit the others blood moon and blah blah blah, i dont care, she looks better in pink, like Dragonslayer Vayne in her blue skin.

replies.body:
The 12/4 PBE update contains the final color scheme for Blood Moon Elise. 

Pink is something we could potentially revisit in the future!
I can't seem to get past 2/2 of that update :(
It's not the same without that skin :(
well I prefer the color that BM Elise is now actually. It gives her outfit a silk or is it satin look to it
